title: WTB non-T206 Bill Donovan Throwing Pose (needed cards in msg)
author: scottbuda

posts.post_title: WTB non-T206 Bill Donovan Throwing Pose (needed cards in msg)
posts.post_content:
I’m slowly trying to build a Bill Donovan throwing pose tobacco card run. I’m wondering if anyone has a T213 Type 1 Coupon for sale-or a possible lead for one? Similarly any T216s out there? I have 2 Kotton variations and am interested in others/Mino/People’s Virginia. 
Thanks.
